Detailed Description

Supplier allowing to access of multiple produced bitmaps.

virtual const iimg::IBitmap* iipr::IMultiBitmapProvider::GetBitmap ( int  bitmapIndex) const [pure virtual]

Get access to produced bitmap object.

Returns:
pointer to bitmap instance if this bitmap is accessible, or NULL.

virtual const iprm::IOptionsList* iipr::IMultiBitmapProvider::GetBitmapSelectionContraints ( ) const [pure virtual]

Get optional information about bitmaps in form of section contraints.

It allows to get name and description of each bitmap channel.

Implemented in icam::CMultiCameraBitmapSupplierComp, iipr::CMultiBitmapCacheComp, and iipr::CColorBitmapSeparatorSupplierComp.
